main event: A pilot observed a small bright green object over the Pacific Ocean on September 27/28, 1952.
interesting points: The object was about 5 feet in diameter and approached the aircraft at a high rate of speed., It was bright green in color and compared to a green light from a control tower., The sighting lasted for about 30 seconds before the object disappeared into a cloud bank., The report notes that the sighting coincided with Soviet mid-Pacific activity, although the timing was outside announced Soviet tests., The observation was made from a DC-8 aircraft at an altitude of 25,000 feet.
